markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Vat-Grown Brain](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2419)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Gatewalkers</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #189: Dreamers of the Nameless Spires](/Sources.aspx?ID=195) pg. 75</row>

**Price** 190 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Three Actions" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A malformed, artificial brain pulses with alchemical life inside a nutrient-rich vat. When the vat-grown brain is activated, it attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) one condition of your choice that was gained from an ability with the [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) trait, which it does by drawing the negative mental impressions into itself. However, the artificial brain is not robust, and the strain of the transfer quickly destroys it. The vat-grown brain has a counteract level of 5 and a +17 modifier on the roll.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Vat-Grown Brain
